name: SINGULARITY CORE
description:
Singularity Core tries to offer a mix of genres. Frenetic action while offering complexity in the builds and the evolution of the gameplay.

Destroy hordes of dangerous enemies

Master fierce battles against bosses.

Discover countless items to customize your gameplay.

Enter your score in an online leaderboard and show others how strong you are.

Notification: 

The game is at the beginning of its life. Many things are missing. But I will do my best to give you the most pleasant experience possible during development.

During development, all visuals are not final.
